alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gilmer; Gordon; Lumpkin; Pickens; White (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 3:28PM EDT until August 07 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lumpkin County in north central Georgia... Southern Gilmer County in north central Georgia... Southern White County in northeastern Georgia... Dawson County in north central Georgia... Southeastern Gordon County in northwestern Georgia... Pickens County in north central Georgia... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 328 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Cartecay to near Blaine to near Ranger, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dahlonega, Jasper, Cleveland, Dawsonville, Nelson, Helen, Talking Rock, Fairmount, Ranger, Amicalola Falls State Park, Sequoyah Lake, Redbud, Juno, Fausett Lake, Len Foote Hike Inn, Cartecay, Talmadge, Oakman, Tate, and Turners Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.

area.areaDesc: Dawson; Gilmer; Gordon; Lumpkin; Pickens; White
